title: The Journey
description: Raven is fleeing from everything he ever knew. He doesn't care where he is headed - he just knows that he has to get away. Caught in a storm and thrown upon a lone island, the pegasus stallion breaks his wing and is unable to fly. While stranded, Raven meets a mysterious and elusive, winged mare named Mira. She has a legendary secret that could save the land of Saphirra - but it is slowly sucking the life out of her. Raven must find his way back to his mate and save his new friend's life. He'll have to face a swamp writhing with kelpies, betrayers and enemies at every turn, earthquakes and sinkholes, and finally, an impossible decision. In this heartwarming and exciting story, you'll be on the edge of your seat the entire time!In this enchanting, third installment to the Legends of Saphirra series, readers ages 8 and up won't be able to pry their eyes from the pages. All funds earned through this series go toward the author's future college education.
author: Emory R. Ivie
